Posts.Content: May 1, 2008 04:19PM runtolive wrote: jordan and luann... http://www.clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT00509769?term=dm1&rank=4&show_locs=Y#locn this is the trastuzumab-dm1 trial.. or herceptin dm1 in MN    United States, Minnesota Minnesota Oncology Hematology,     Recruiting       Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States, 55404        Contact: Katie Halbur     612-863-8827     mailto:katie.halbur@usoncology.com?subject=NCT00509769, TDM4258g, A Study of Trastuzumab-MCC-DM1 Administered Intravenously to Patients With HER2-Positive Metastatic Breast Cancer   contact them..  its a every 3 week trial dosed at 3.6mg/kg of tras-dm1...  i know a few girls on it and all are doing fantastic... run to live
Posts.Title: ixempra - any one have any experience with it?: jordan luvyoumom
